project.detail: Availability Based Tariff (ABT) is a frequency based pricing mechanism applicable in India for unscheduled electric power transactions. ... Generators and Discoms are not required to keep the grid frequency in the permitted range under this proposal and the applicable power tariff is delinked from the grid frequency.
project.Learning: Teamwork, Design, Interview , Information Architecture, Wireframe, Market survey, UX testing, Persona, Team Management
steps: Designed a modern UI for the admin panel.
Implemented template repository for other backend developers.
Explored multiple libraries for UI enhancements.
Resolved common UI errors and provided training.
